Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the brawl occurred at an Aam Aadmi Party meeting, when in reality it involved two prominent Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) politicians.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a misleading video and does not provide any additional evidence or sources.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is from an Aam Aadmi Party meeting without providing any concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video actually shows a fight between two BJP politicians in Sant Kabir Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, which is supported by multiple reports and sources.
Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as exaggerating the incident by describing it as a "brawl" and a "shoe fight" without providing any context or details about the actual altercation.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim may be seen as faltering at times by presenting misleading information and not accurately representing the true nature of the incident.
